article_title: ACA ruling: You can now get sued for reducing employees' hours
article_text: Get the latest and greatest Human Resources news and insights delivered to your inbox.

og.description: This U.S. district court ruling is a real game-changer for employers — and not in a good way. Turns out, you CAN now be sued for simply reducing an employee’s hours.
og.title: ACA ruling: You can now get sued for reducing employees’ hours
